sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SAIPOOR, a town of Hindustan, in the province of Gundwana, possessed by independent zemindars. It is situated on the north-west side of the Rhair river, fifteen miles from the southern frontier of the Rhotas district, in Bahar. Long. 82. 50. E. Lat. 24. 2. N.
